tool_description: DuckDuckGo Zero-click Info includes topic summaries, categories, disambiguation, official sites, !bang redirects, definitions and more. You can use this API for many things, e.g. define people, places, things, words and concepts; provides direct links to other services (via !bang syntax); list related topics; and gives official sites when available.
name: DuckDuckGo Zero-click Info
title: DuckDuckGo Zero-click Info

api_list.name: Zero Click Info
api_list.description: Our Zero-click Info API gives you free access to much of our topic summaries, categories, disambiguation, !bang redirects, definitions and more.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Function to callback (for a JSONP formatted response).

optional_parameters.name: no_html
optional_parameters.description: 1 to remove HTML from text, e.g. bold and italics.

optional_parameters.name: no_redirect
optional_parameters.description: 1 to skip HTTP redirects (for !bang commands - see http://duckduckgo.com/bang.html).
